42464.name: Low income (World Bank 2017)
42464.description: The low income threshold is calculated using gross national income (GNI) per capita in US$ using the Atlas methodology.
42464.datasetName: World Bank Income Thresholds - World Bank (2017)

source.name: World Bank (2017)
source.additionalInfo: The Atlas methodology is used to reduce the impact of exchange rate fluctuations in the cross-country comparison of national incomes.
